rbiom 1.0.3.9061

Get BIOM object's miscellaneous information.

Source: R/accessors.r
info.Rd

Get BIOM object's miscellaneous information.

info(biom)

Arguments

biom

A BIOM object, as returned from read_biom.

Value

A list of the top-level metadata in biom.

See also

Other accessors: counts(), depth(), has_phylogeny(), has_sequences(), id(), is_rarefied(), metadata(), nsamples(), ntaxa(), phylogeny(), sample_names(), sample_sums(), sequences(), taxa_names(), taxa_ranks(), taxonomy()

Examples

    library(rbiom)
    info(hmp50)
#> $id
#> [1] "Human Microbiome Project - 50 Sample Demo"
#> 
#> $type
#> [1] "OTU table"
#> 
#> $format
#> [1] "1.0.0"
#> 
#> $format_url
#> [1] "http://biom-format.org"
#> 
#> $generated_by
#> [1] "rbiom 1.0.2.9026"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "2021-07-01T18:48:45Z"
#> 
#> $matrix_type
#> [1] "sparse"
#> 
#> $matrix_element_type
#> [1] "int"
#> 
#> $shape
#> [1] 490  50
#> 
#> $comment
#> [1] ""
#>
